name: Neighbour Sweet Neighbour
description:
Neighbour simulator.
The goal is to cover your neighbour's home in paint, and avoid him to cover yours.

* This is a 1 vs 1 game. It can be played either with keyboard + controller or controller + controller

Controls:
Joystick, WASD or arrows to move
Space or A button to jump
Left click, X or B button to shoot
Right click, Y button to throw a balloon
Left Trigger to aim slower
RightTrigger to aim faster
